DataElement.preferredName: Hematopoietic Cell Graft Manipulation Other Technique Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not the hematopoietic cell graft was manipulated by another method.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Hematopoietic Cell Graft Manipulation Other Technique
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)_Healthy skin, bone, or other tissue taken from one part of the body and used to replace diseased or injured tissue removed from another part of the body._Move, treat, or operate with the hands or by mechanical means, especially in a skillful manner._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._A practiced and regimented skill or series of actions.
